import React, { StatelessComponent } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Jumbotron from 'react-bootstrap/Jumbotron' const Content: React.StatelessComponent = () => { return(

Speak Up for Our Planet

We are a grassroots advocacy campaign that wants to empower you to speak up on behalf of our planet and its marginalized peoples.

We make it easy for you to contact the companies you give your hard-earned dollars to and encourage them to change their practices for the good of the planet and the good of the people. We believe that if enough people speak up for change, corporations will pay attention.

Select an active campaign on the left, or use the button below to suggest a new campaign. Our team will research the issue and create a new campaign.

); }; export default Content;
